snippet: The Cleveland police, who arrested four members of London Fletcher’s family, say the “riot” was caused by the fans now facing charges.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Washington Redskins linebacker London Fletcher blames security workers at Cleveland Browns Stadium for confrontation that led to arrests of several of his relatives; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Cleveland police, who arrested four members of London Fletcher’s family, say the “riot” was caused by the fans now facing charges.

headline.seo: Redskins’ London Fletcher Blames Browns Stadium Security for Fracas
headline.main: Player Points At Security Over Arrest Of Relatives
headline.print_headline: Player Points At Security Over Arrest Of Relatives
